entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
